summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 39th Avenue South, from Court Street to Charlestown Street; and Court Street, from Bellavista Avenue to 39th Avenue South, all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 81880 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
